Join Kotlin Heroes: Episode 12 and Win Kotlin Swag

Kotlin Heroes is a fun and challenging contest with problems designed to be interesting for programmers of all levels. Solve algorithmic problems, learn more about Kotlin, and get a chance to win prizes!

The main contest will take place on April 7, 2025, but the practice round is already open – so jump in anytime to get familiar with the format.

Join the contest

How it works:

  • Warm up during the practice round. You’ll find tips and solutions to problems from previous episodes.
  • On April 7, compete in the main contest. You’ll have 2 hours 30 minutes to solve up to 10 problems.
  • After the contest, stay tuned for results – you might win some awesome Kotlin swag!

Why join?

  • Practice and improve your Kotlin skills.
  • Compete with others in a fun way.
  • Win cool prizes.

Prizes:

  • 1st place: USD 512
  • 2nd place: USD 256
  • 3rd place: USD 128
  • Places 4 through 50: Kotlin Heroes T-shirt
  • Plus, 50 more Kotlin Heroes T-shirts will be raffled off among all participants who’ve solved at least one problem.

A boost before the competition:

  • Watch our competitive programming playlist for tips and tricks from some of the world’s top programmers.
  • Read this competitive programming tutorial for Kotliners.
  • Check out some of the recent Kotlin Heroes contests – Episode 9, Episode 10, and Episode 11.

Register now

See you on April 7, and good luck!
